Name: Seductive Tombs
About the game: It's puzzle time! Find the right combinations of levers to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements. Now with the Skip Level feature! 15 challenging levels Uncensored content Beat the record times to earn stars Realistic graphics Atmospheric music 30 achievements Display girls from the gallery Easily skip levels - unlock girls if you can't beat a level for more than 10 mins
